TopicTitle: Probe to 1.5m rocket body dual, tri and quad adapters

Articles.Content:
Please, please, please. These would be really, really useful. Especially for proper application of 48-7s rocket motors.

Thanks!

I agree. I would love to have these!!

I wish we got a couple of new generic parts with each expansion.
Seconded. Would be really nice not having to invert those tiny struts to get things looking interesting.
